pcd.data

Class PcdPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Point2D
      • java.awt.Point
        • pcd.data.PcdPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public final class PcdPoint
extends Point
implements Serializable
    Author:
    Tibor Sloboda Based on Point with extensions, but used similarly. It is displayed over an image and can be updated, and then saved to be used as annotations for machine learning.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object obj)
        Checks whether an object is a point and if the points are the same by comparing their x coordinate, y coordinate and type id.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Point
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to compare point to
        Returns:
        true if object is a point and matches this point's coordinates and type, otherwise lets Object class compare references

      • isAnglePositive

        public boolean isAnglePositive()
        Determined whether the angle is in 1st quadrant.
        Returns:
        true if in 1st quadrant, false if in 4th quadrant

      • setAnglePositive

        public void setAnglePositive(boolean anglePos)
        Sets the quadrant of the angle.
        Parameters:
        anglePos - the 'positiveness' of the angle where true corresponds to 1st quadrant and false to 4th quadrant
